meanings.definition: Refuse to take notice of or acknowledge.
meanings.sent1: She ignores the loud music coming from the neighbor's house.
meanings.sent2: The teacher ignores the students talking during the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The cat ignores the new toy and plays with the box instead.
meanings.sent4: His mind ignores the distractions and focuses on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The driver ignores the detour signs and gets lost.

meanings.definition: Fail to consider or pay attention to.
meanings.sent1: He ignores the warning signs and continues on the dangerous path.
meanings.sent2: The manager ignores the suggestions of the team members.
meanings.sent3: The robot ignores the command and goes in the opposite direction.
meanings.sent4: The detective ignores the obvious clue, leading to a wrong conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The student ignores the study guide and fails the test.

meanings.sent1: The company ignores the complaints of its customers.
meanings.sent2: She ignores the negative comments and focuses on the positive feedback.
meanings.sent3: The child ignores the 'keep off the grass' sign and runs on the lawn.
meanings.sent4: The artist ignores the rules of traditional painting and creates a new style.
meanings.sent5: The hiker ignores the warning about bears and goes into the forest alone.
